entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 5:13 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then clearing. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:13 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Clear in the evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with periods of snow beginning before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:13 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
